column5: It's in response Speedtroll's son, who is very sick with cancer.  Someone had the idea to put BELIEVE in signatures for him....many of us have done so to support him and his family.

Here is a link to the original thread.......  Believe!  bly
Thanks for the link bly.  Add me to the list of those that BELIEVE   FOTB

OK, I goofed. but at least I tried!
Does anyone have an update on Chris? I've been thinking about him a lot lately.
